thread.title: Spokeswoman for Lamar Odom's aunt says he woke up and spoke
thread.title_full: Spokeswoman for Lamar Odom's aunt says he woke up and spoke

author: SALLY HO
title: Spokeswoman for Lamar Odom's aunt says he woke up and spoke
text:
Ross D. Franklin Spokeswoman for Lamar Odom's aunt says he woke up and spoke 
FILE - In this April 24, 2007, file photo, Los Angeles Lakers' Lamar Odom sits on the bench in the fourth quarter of a Western Conference playoff basketball game against the Phoenix Suns in Phoenix. Odom, who was embraced by teammates and television fans alike for his Everyman approach to fame, was found face-down and alone Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015, after spending four days at the Love Ranch, a legal Nevada brothel. (AP Photo/Ross D. Franklin, File) Jeff Lewis Spokeswoman for Lamar Odom's aunt says he woke up and spoke 
FILE - In this July 31, 2009, file photo, Los Angeles Lakers' Lamar Odom speaks to the media during a news conference after the Lakers signed Odom to a multi-year NBA basketball contract, in El Segundo, Calif. Odom spent most of his 14-year NBA career in Los Angeles with the Lakers and Clippers, becoming a fan favorite before he sought even more fame with the Kardashians. Odom, who was embraced by teammates and television fans alike for his Everyman approach to fame, was found face-down and alone Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015, after spending four days at the Love Ranch, a legal Nevada brothel. (AP Photo/Jeff Lewis, File) Mark J. Terrill Spokeswoman for Lamar Odom's aunt says he woke up and spoke 
FILE - In this March 2, 2008, file photo, Los Angeles Lakers forward Lamar Odom reacts to a call during the second half of their NBA basketball game against the Dallas Mavericks, in Los Angeles. Odom spent most of his 14-year NBA career in Los Angeles with the Lakers and Clippers, becoming a fan favorite before he sought even more fame with the Kardashians. Odom, who was embraced by teammates and television fans alike for his Everyman approach to fame, was found face-down and alone Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015, after spending four days at the Love Ranch, a legal Nevada brothel.(AP Photo/Mark J. Terrill, File) Posted: Friday, October 16, 2015 6:58 pm | Updated: 8:02 pm, Fri Oct 16, 2015. Spokeswoman for Lamar Odom's aunt says he woke up and spoke Associated Press | 0 comments 
LAS VEGAS (AP) — A family representative said Lamar Odom has regained consciousness, and was speaking and even offered a thumbs-up from his hospital bed, just days after being found in extremely critical condition at a Nevada brothel. 
Alvina Alston, publicist for JaNean Mercer, Odom's maternal aunt and godmother, said that Odom spoke a greeting and gave a thumbs-up Friday morning, his first communication since being hospitalized in Las Vegas Tuesday. kAmp A6CD@?
